ee.sk.xmlenc.factory
Class EncryptedStreamSAXParser

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      ee.sk.xmlenc.factory.EncryptedStreamSAXParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
EncryptedStreamParser, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class EncryptedStreamSAXParser
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
implements EncryptedStreamParser

Implementation class for reading and writing encrypted files using a SAX parser

Version:
1.0
Author:
Veiko Sinivee

decryptStreamUsingRecipientName

public int decryptStreamUsingRecipientName(java.io.InputStream dencStream,
                                           java.io.OutputStream outs,
                                           int token,
                                           java.lang.String pin,
                                           java.lang.String recipientName)
                                    throws DigiDocException
Reads in a EncryptedData file (.cdoc)

Specified by:
decryptStreamUsingRecipientName in interface EncryptedStreamParser
Parameters:
dencStream - opened stream with EncrypyedData data The user must open and close it.
outs - output stream for decrypted data
token - index of PKCS#11 token used
pin - pin code to decrypt transport key using PKCS#11
recipientName - Recipient atribute value of used to locate the correct transport key to decrypt with
Returns:
number of bytes successfully decrypted
Throws:
DigiDocException - for decryption errors
